name: portraitist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an artist who paints, draws, or photographs portraits (= pictures of people): Reynolds was the leading portraitist of his generation. An American portraitist, she paints African Americans in everyday settings.
More examplesFewer examplesHe was highly renowned as a portraitist in his native Austria.Favray worked as a portraitist all over Europe.Society portraitists could achieve enormous celebrity in that period.Copley was a portraitist who earned his fame by painting George Washington and other American patriots.Portraitists would represent their subjects in poses that idealized family life.
